abstract: An analyst says Walt Disney Co. may sell its 10 ABC television stations.
snippet: An analyst says Walt Disney Co. may sell its 10 ABC television stations.
lead_paragraph: “Walt Disney Co., the second-largest U.S. media company, may sell its 10 ABC television stations, fetching as much as $4.8 billion, said David Miller, an analyst at Caris & Co. who has covered the company since 2000,” Bloomberg reports.

headline.main: Analyst Suggests Disney May Sell ABC TV Stations; Company Denies
